title: Details
text: This template is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, unless you want to customize the default styling.

section.title: 1 mEUR = 1 EUR
section.content: Redeem 1 mEUR for 1 EUR worth of MATIC. Anytime.

section.title: 0% interest loans
section.content: Maintain exposure to your crypto while borrowing stablecoin liquidity for your goals.

section.title: Earn on mEUR
section.content: Earn by providing liquidity for mEUR on major DeFi exchanges such as Curve or Sushiswap.

section.title: Stability that needs no governance
section.content: The highly efficient liquidation mechanism enables you to reliably store and trade euro on blockchain.
